concept.title: Quick Selection
concept.shortdesc: You can use QSELECT to create a selection set includable or exclusive of the objects which are accord with the filtering criterion. The selection set created by the QSELECT command can be applied to the entire drawing and replaces or appends to the current selection set.

conbody.p: You can enter QSELECT on the command line or click Quick Select button fromthe Properties palette to open Quick Select dialog box. With the specified filtering condition, you can quickly define the selection set.
